name: JellyStream
description: Search and update series from Aniworld and SerienStream directly within Jellyfin
overview: JellyStream plugin allows you to search for series from Aniworld and SerienStream and update them with the latest episodes. Features include live log streaming, real-time updates, and a clean search interface.

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- Search series from Aniworld and SerienStream
- Update individual series with live log streaming
- Real-time progress updates
- Configurable script path
